# HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges.decreased

**Case**

The user’s appetite decreased.

## Declaration

```swift
case decreased
```

## Appetite Changes

- **HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges.increased**: The user’s appetite increased.
- **HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges.noChange**: No change in the user’s appetite.
- **HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges.unspecified**: An unspecified change in appetite.

items.description: No change in the user’s appetite.
items.name: HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges.noChange
